XACC-VQE¶

Installation¶

The XACC-VQE Plugin provides support to XACC for executing programs on the ORNL tensor network quantum virtual machine.

To install this plugin, run the following

$ git clone https://github.com/ornl-qci/xacc-vqe
$ cd xacc-vqe && mkdir build && cd build
$ cmake .. -DXACC_DIR=$HOME/.xacc

If you installed the XACC Python bindings, then you can run

$ cmake .. -DXACC_DIR=$(python -m xacc -L)

ensuring that xacc is in your PYTHONPATH.

You have now installed the XACC-VQE plugin. It is located in $XACC_ROOT/plugins, where XACC_ROOT is your XACC install prefix.
